Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.graphs.undirected

Class AbstractGraph<V,Adj>

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.graphs.undirected.AbstractGraph<V,Adj>
Type Parameters:
V - the vertex type.
Adj - the adjacency type: can be vertex or edge.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph<V,Adj>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiGraph, Graph_Edges, Graph_Simple
public abstract class AbstractGraph<V,Adj> extends Object implements Graph<V,Adj>
Abstract class for Graphs. This should be extended by both directed and undirected graphs.

  • Field Details

    • adjacentEdges

      protected final Map<V,Bag<Adj>> adjacentEdges
      A map that associates each vertex with a collection (Bag) of its adjacent entities. The keys of the map represent vertices of the graph, while the values are Bags that contain the adjacency information for each vertex, allowing multiple occurrences of adjacent entities.

  • Constructor Details

      public AbstractGraph()

  • Method Details

    • addVertex

      public void addVertex(V vertex)
      Method to add a vertex (without having to add an edge).
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex to be added.

    • vertices

      public SizedIterable<V> vertices()
      Retrieves an iterable collection of all vertices in the graph.
      Specified by:
      vertices in interface Graph<V,Adj>
      Returns:
      a SizedIterable<V> that provides access to all vertices in the graph, with efficient size retrieval and iteration capabilities.

    • adjacent

      public Iterable<Adj> adjacent(V v)
      Retrieves the entities adjacent to the specified vertex.
      Specified by:
      adjacent in interface Graph<V,Adj>
      Parameters:
      v - the vertex whose adjacent entities are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an Iterable containing the adjacent entities for the given vertex.

    • getAdjacencyBag

      protected Bag<Adj> getAdjacencyBag(V vertex)
      Retrieves the adjacency bag associated with a given vertex. If the vertex does not already have an adjacency bag, a new empty bag is created, added to the map, and returned.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex for which to retrieve or create an adjacency bag
      Returns:
      the adjacency bag associated with the specified vertex
